snippet: When Americans voted to renew President Barack Obama's lease on the White House in November 2012, more than 9 million citizens took to Facebook to click the "I'm a Voter" button, showing their online friends that they had cast a ballot....

headline.print_headline: Facebook to Roll Out 'I'm a Voter' Feature Worldwide
headline.main: Facebook to Roll Out 'I'm a Voter' Feature Worldwide

lead_paragraph: When Americans voted to renew President Barack Obama's lease on the White House in November 2012, more than 9 million citizens took to Facebook to click the "I'm a Voter" button, showing their online friends that they had cast a ballot.
